actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: Resolution to launch an investigation by the General Accounting Office into alleged abuses of rights of privacy by telephone companies.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Directs the General Accounting Office to conduct an investigation into the current practice of several telephone companies to monitor private sections of telephone conversations between the customers and company employees and to report results of the investigation to Congress, together with recommendations to end this blatant abuse of the right of privacy.

titles.title: Resolution to launch an investigation by the General Accounting Office into alleged abuses of rights of privacy by telephone companies.
